text: Hi, I'm Emily Graslie, host of The Brain Scoop here at the Field Museum in Chicago
May 18th is International Museum Day so I wanted to curate a playlist of videos that show you
some of the fascinating work happening at museums all over the world
Museums are invaluable institutions for cultural appreciation, education, and research
In the United States alone, there are around 850 million visits to museums every year
That's more than the attendance to major sporting events and theme parks combined!
I love museums, I love these videos, and I hope you'll check them out for International Museum Day
